name: Mira
appearance: Short and quick, lantern-polish under the nails, a braided wick looped around her wrist.
character: Bright and relentless on a case; kindly in the quiet hours.
talents: hears rehearsed stories by their cadence
runs rooftops at dusk without stumbling
dreams: clean the Wickwards' name of old slanders
build protections for Veil defectors who testify
earn a bell-note in the Hall of Lanterns
secrets: copied sealed writs to warn targeted engineers
meets Seler off-book to trade intel on smuggling routes
keeps a friend inside the Veil unnamed in any ledger
